actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide primarily for the reduction of soil blowing; and to control snow deposition and conserve moisture; to protect crops, orchards, and livestock; to provide food and cover for wildlife; to conserve energy, to increase the natural beauty of the landscape; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Shelterbelt Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a special shelterbelt program (vegetative barrier). Authorizes the Secretary to enter into ten-year agreements with landowners and operators to create and maintain such shelterbelts. Sets forth program guidelines.

titles.title: A bill to provide primarily for the reduction of soil blowing; and to control snow deposition and conserve moisture; to protect crops, orchards, and livestock; to provide food and cover for wildlife; to conserve energy, to increase the natural beauty of the landscape; and for other purposes.
